name: DRIFT RACERS (iCOOKI3)
description:
Controls:

Click on the "PLAY" button to start playing!

Click on the the "Credits" button to view all the assets used in the game!

"W" key/Up arrow key to acceleration

"S" key/Down arrow key to deceleration

"A" key/Left arrow key to move to turn left

"D" key/Right arrow key to move to turn right

Spacebar to use handbrake

Use Mouse Left Click to navigate through the game menu and UI

*Note: Enter fullscreen while playing so that the arrow keys would not interfere with the gameplay(Scrolling)

Tips:

1.The player's car has better acceleration and top speed than the Enemy but it is slow in turns, so make use of straight roads throughout the race to gain the advantage!

2.The Enemy would often take shortcuts/cut corners to cheat in order to win the race so WATCHOUT!

3.Use the "Outside In" technique. Which is to take a corner form the outside and accelerate at the apex point for the best results!
